lenders.name: Élio

Because I was lucky enought to be born in Portugal, to have a family and to get an education...

Because other people where not as lucky as I was/am, and because they (and their families) deserve a chance to become as lucky as I am...

lenders.name: Sean

lenders.occupational_info: I am a highschool student, who part-times working in a steel-rule die shop.

It is important that we assist the World's working poor who are honestly trying to make a living for themselves and their families.

lenders.occupational_info:
I am a retired Insurance Accounting Analyst (F.I.I.C.) (F.C.I.P.)

lenders.name: Jennie
lenders.occupational_info: When I can't find words, I create something that will speak for me.

lenders.name: Uncle Bo

lenders.occupational_info: Jordan is in the business of making movies and Serena is a college student.

lenders.occupational_info: I am an ethnobotanist, studying how people use, think about and know plants.

lenders.loan_because: I like helping people.

It lets me share my wealth with someone who is in need of it.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a paper-mill . where i am responsible for keeping the machines running.

lenders.occupational_info: A full-time history student, aspiring to become a teacher..working part-time at a cultural centre and a lottery that supports good causes..

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.occupational_info: Online advertising

lenders.name: Virginia

lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher but I continue to teach the Bible to older women in my church.

lenders.name: VALPO-SIFE
lenders.loan_because: VALPO-SIFE  strives to make a difference.  Changing lives is what we live for!!!!

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born in a wealthy nation and able to utilize the advantages this provided me.  Kiva is a way for me to give back and perhaps in a small way help ease world tensions between have and have not countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I help victims of all kinds of abuse deal with their past issues.  I also study how people learn.  I explain my findings to the person, the person's teachers, friends and family, so that the person's support system can better help them.

lenders.name: Alyssa
lenders.occupation: Loving Life & Teaching little children big things
lenders.loan_because: "Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.' - Leo Buscaglia

lenders.name: scott
lenders.loan_because: uncommon threads

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.occupation: Health Project Coordinator - HIV Vaccine Research
lenders.loan_because: my first KIVA gift certificate ($25.)was a Christmas present to me from my Secret Santa here at work. However, I choose to re-invest in Kiva for two reasons: 1. because my first 'loan' was 'repaid in full' thereby giving credibility to the Kiva loan system; and 2. because in my heart I believe if we all help one another to be successful in whatever it is we choose to do, and to the extent we as individuals are able, then the planet would soon become a happier and healthier place to live.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to ensure that persons from this area are informed about, and take part in HIV vaccine research studies. These studies are conducted by the University of Rochester Medical Center and are sponsored by the U.S. National Institutes of Health. The goal is to find a vaccine that can prevent AIDS.  However, this goal requires healthy  men and women to get informed about the research process and to 'roll up their sleeves' to take part in this global research initiative. My role is to inform the general public here in Rochester NY that the study vaccines are 'synthetic' and that it is IMPOSSIBLE for participants to get HIV infection from the vaccines being tested. Our mission? A World Without AIDS.

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.occupation: Eating and sleeping! (I am only 6 months old)
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help make the world a better place.  It can be if we all support each other.

lenders.name: Toni
lenders.loan_because: for my grandkids to learn the value of reaching out to help.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do and I genuinely care about people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people in the Washington, DC area switch to a clean renewable energy source for their electricity needs.

lenders.name: Joshua Leu
lenders.loan_because: Change the world! Bring about the Kingdom of God.
lenders.occupational_info: Pastor

lenders.name: Emily and Kevin
lenders.loan_because: It helps other people get out of poverty.

lenders.name: Jennafer
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people the tools and resources to empower themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help a family foundation make grants to nonprofit organizations around the world.

lenders.name: Ken & Brenda
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes you just need somebody to believe in you.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I like to think it will help make someone's life better.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in law school, but a full time wanderer.

lenders.loan_because: to help people to help themselves.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in marketing for a large technology company based in the US

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I see alot of excess in my business and the world, and seek ways to achieve balance for my peace of mind and the greater good. I hope to spread the good fortune I have been given.

lenders.loan_because: I like it.

lenders.name: Nick & Cameron
lenders.loan_because: We like to help people when we can
lenders.occupational_info: We are students...we read and study alot.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed to have so much abundance in my life and believe that I need to help others achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping communities manage their population and household growth in order to create healthy, vibrant, desirable places to live, work, and enjoy family life.

lenders.name: LeeZu Baxter
lenders.loan_because: We believe strongly in the power of direct aid to improve peoples lives.  We have seen in our own lives the frustration of dealing with large impersonal organizations. Micro loans work!

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help others that I can help.

lenders.name: Friends of Joe
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do until joining Peace Corps in my retirement
lenders.occupational_info: Facilitate communications between different stake holders

lenders.name: Fay
lenders.loan_because: I would like to be a blessing to someone else for all that has been given to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the liason between the construction guys who build the homes and the home owners who have bought them.

lenders.name: Albert
lenders.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur, and I would like to help others enjoy the same opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct all kinds of technology projects for clients in the US, and work with people from Russia too.  It's a small world!

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: These businesses need a helping hand, not a hand out.  They just need a bit of a break and they will do wonders.  Where else can such a small bit of faith in the human condition make such a difference?
lenders.occupational_info: I am a geologist by schooling and have spent a number of years wandering the earth looking for gold, tungsten and uranium.  Now I assemble groups of talented individuals, attract capital and watch the magic when good ideas, good people and a little capital all come together.

lenders.name: Russ
lenders.loan_because: Poverty breeds revolution.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: This is the way we now give meaningful gifts and enriching others lives rather than gift giving to family that already has more than they need!

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate live happier lives.

lenders.name: Rindert
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Dutch Postcode Lottery. It has been raising funds to support organizations working for a fairer, greener world. Fifty percent of its income goes to charity. The lottery has grown to become the Netherlands' biggest charity lottery and supports 64 charitable organizations. Since its founding, the lottery has dispensed more than 2.7 billion euros to its beneficiaries.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because, now I can. 
In the past I have experienced financial/personal distress. I will always remember the strength I derived from a gesture of kindness or help. 
The benefit goes way beyond the dollar value of the loan. And I benefit, too.
lenders.occupational_info:
I reproduce fantastic works of art created by others in digital print form. These are large beautiful Giclées on canvas and paper.  Also a freelance support/tutor/consultant/fix-it Mac and Photoshop gal.
And finally, I enjoy photographing the world around me.  Sometimes  a photograph is produced, and often the photo becomes a digital darkroom creation.

lenders.name: Steve & Mary
lenders.occupational_info: We work at living the best way we can for us and this world. We fail everyday and wake up and try it again. I hope we're getting better at it.

lenders.name: Don & Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: to offer a hand up to those who just need a little support to get started towards a better life, to promote self reliance and the competitive business spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a commercial construction company partner specializing in medical clinic construction and tenant improvements projects

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life, give them a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I source and buy home decor items in India and China and sell them across Canada and the USA.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: everybody who can help somebody should help somebody... there are folks out there that need that little help to get onto their feet. Not just a hand out but a chance to prove themselves, develop their own self-confidence. Too many people don't get that and I think KIVA is an amazing idea.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: I see the world as a community where each of us has the opportunity to help each other.  Micro loans are an excellent way to help people in emerging economies around the world have a better life.  This benefits us all.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead bus tours in the Western United States and travel frequently for work and pleasure.

lenders.name: Isaiah
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Tom Allen, a U.S. Senate Candidate from the great State of Maine.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I am a believer in the microfinance concept and want to help people start or grow their businesses as I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I am self-employed and run a home-based business selling a software product to local governments.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I don't have a lot of money, but I still want to be able to make a difference.

lenders.name: Darryl
lenders.loan_because: investing in people produces incredible returns!
lenders.occupational_info: Families entrust their savings to me.  I invest their money in stocks or mutual funds.  My job is to make their money work hard or them.

lenders.name: Cyryna
lenders.loan_because: I want to see my money go where it could be very useful. Instead of buying me unnecessary things like name brand clothes, name brand handbags, etc.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am currently persuing a Bachelor's Degree in Global Business Management as a full time college student. 

I currently work part-time as an Assistant Manager at a toy store.

lenders.name: Hans
lenders.loan_because: one more hand doing something useful means one less hand shooting something at me
lenders.occupational_info: I blow up things

lenders.name: Kerry & Tim

lenders.occupational_info: We work in aerospace engineering - helping to connect the world through air travel.

lenders.name: Erika
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to succeed.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to make such a change in another person's life!  I'm grateful to be able to share the abundance in my life with others.

lenders.name: The Bridge
lenders.loan_because: But if anyone has the world's goods and sees his brother in need, yet closes his heart against him, how does God's love abide in him? Little children, let us not love in word or talk but in deed and in truth. (1John 3:17-18)

lenders.name: KEYA
lenders.loan_because: ...micro lending works and reminds all people that a new opportunity is created every minute.

lenders.name: Jake, Stef, Max, Peter
lenders.loan_because: We believe in Microcredit. We have been to Guatemala and seen what a positive impact Micro Credit has had on the people there.
lenders.occupational_info: Our family business provides insurance to protect people who have homes, cars, and businesses from disasters that would hurt their ability to keep what they have and do what they do.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I have enough - it's time we gave back.

lenders.name: jon
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist people to empower themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
I founded and operate a growing health food company based in Adelaide Australia. Jama Enterprises manufactures propolis lozenges and non - aluminium anti perspirants and additionally imports manuka honey from NZ.
Jama sell throughout Australia and NZ and are currently expanding into Sth Africa and Peru

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.occupational_info: I help inventors protect their inventions by obtaining patents for them.

lenders.name: Goldrich Enterprises
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.

lenders.name: keerthy
lenders.loan_because: this seemingly small act put together with so many others.. empowers someone out there to be self-sustained.

lenders.loan_because: God says "You shall love your neighbor as yourself" as a Christian in today's world with the internet, everyone in the world is my neighbor!
lenders.occupational_info: I write code for computers to build things like web sites and the programs that run on the computer.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: This is a more direct and personal way of helping those in need who are willing to work their way out of difficult circumstances.

lenders.name: Melissa

lenders.occupational_info: I help kids learn to love reading by picking out the most exciting books in the world.

lenders.name: Margaret

lenders.loan_because: I believe it’s important to teach my children that if you can lend a hand you should. And with this program we can directly see how the process works.
lenders.occupational_info: Mother of 2 boys

lenders.loan_because: I want to help developing countries and I like to push the entrepreneurs, Kiva let me a fantastic way to achieve both

lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to help people who are willing to work but have few opportunities to get ahead.
lenders.occupational_info: Bryan is a very talented musician, producer,  and songwriter and Holly helps people by talking with them and giving them a place to bring their pain and tribulations.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because:
Because it's the right thing to do!
I'm grateful for all those who have been there for me and want to be there for someon else in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep track of monies that go in and out of the bank for my employer. He owns properties that people rent to run their business. We receive their rent and pay vendors for electricity, gas, telephones, repairs and taxes. Whatever is left over is considered profit. It's tough right now as many tenants are having to close their doors & I feel bad for them. Many of them have become my friends and they are struggling.

lenders.name: Bresden
lenders.loan_because: People who have the ability to help have a responsibility to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to 13 and 15 year olds.

lenders.name: Juha
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.occupational_info: I teach children sciency things.

lenders.loan_because: I want to make someone's day a little better.
lenders.occupational_info: I study numbers, and I work on projects to improve various business processes.

lenders.name: Arie

lenders.occupational_info: My work involves helping people and organizations to come to grips with the new ways of working that are prompted by the ever-growing globalization of the world's economy.

lenders.name: renee
lenders.loan_because: "one person can make a difference..."
lenders.occupational_info: jewellery designer

lenders.name: Toby
lenders.loan_because: People who can help, should help! I want everyone to have a fair chance at a good life
lenders.occupational_info: I create ways for doctors to share information with each other on the Internet.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe that so many around the world could make better lives for themselves if they just had a little boost up to get them started.
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare tax returns to pay the bills and rescue cats to feed my soul.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to. I believe in empowering people who want a hand up, not just a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: Business Owner

lenders.loan_because: to improve the quality of lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Information Technology is challenging, but stressful. I prefer sitting around playing fat notes on my Gibson SG guitar.

lenders.name: AustinGiving

lenders.name: Jaime
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Cesar

lenders.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lenders.occupational_info: I help educational institutions change their teaching and learning styles to help today's youth be tomorrow's content creators.

lenders.name: KMess44

lenders.name: Mitch
lenders.loan_because: I think KIVA has it right.  Give people a vested interest in what they do and it makes a world of difference.
lenders.occupational_info: buy and sell stocks

lenders.name: Clayton
lenders.loan_because: I support globalization, free trade, capitalism and hard work.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: Good fortune has a lot to do with success, together with hard work and perseverance.  Getting a hand up at the right time helped me, and might help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am trying to understand why people get cancer and how eating the right kind of food can prevent or cure their cancer.

lenders.name: Jijesh & Colleen
lenders.loan_because: Colleen and I are very fortunate to have a good life. Further, we believe entrepreneurship is the most effective tool to fight poverty, and we are aspiring entrepreneurs ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Colleen is a very creative packaged foods Product developer for a Fortune 100 company, and Jijesh goes to school for his PhD in Management.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work on sustainable energy projects.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: My friend gave me a Kiva gift for Christmas
lenders.occupational_info: In retirement I am daring to be creative.  I'm currently working on art quilts.

lenders.name: Veronica E.
lenders.loan_because: it's a wonderful feeling to assist others in achieving their goals.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am working on my doctorate in sociology-- the study of society and its social structures, institutions, and processes.

Although my research focuses on my own country (the US), sociology has helped me to realize that we are all interconnected across the globe.

lenders.name: Jimmy
lenders.loan_because: Give a person a fish, feed him for a day - teach a person to fish, feed him for a lifetime.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: My Grandma gave this opportunity to me for Christmas as a gift

lenders.name: The Hands & Gresham
lenders.occupation: Believers in Jesus-the Power to change the world.
lenders.loan_because:
Let your light shine before men that they may see your good deeds & praise your Father in Heaven...So in everything, do for others what you would have them do for you.  Matt 5:16 & 7:12  

Every good thing bestowed is from above...James 1:17

In memory of George S. Sr. & Madaline Hand
lenders.occupational_info: Back, L-R Judith & George- retired College Professors/Administrators, Emily-Dance Instructor, Cathy Gresham-Doctor; Front L-R Greg-Computer Specialist, Tobie-Interior Designer; Boys-growing angels

lenders.name: Jolinda
lenders.loan_because: I feel that I don't just make a difference in one family. My loan helps to change the whole community.

lenders.name: Jasmin
lenders.loan_because: I want to play with everybody in the world some day.
lenders.occupational_info: 2 parts milk, 1 part sleep and 100 parts LOVE and KINDNESS!

lenders.name: jessie
lenders.loan_because: i believe in think globally, act locally
lenders.occupational_info: i listen to problems then sell solutions, it involves a lot of communication

lenders.name: Carrie-Leigh
lenders.loan_because: I want to see first hand where my money is going.  I do support various charities although I become disgruntled with the fact that your money is potentially going on administration.  Kiva gives me the chance to put 100% of my money into the hands of someone that needs it and THEN dontate to Kiva themselves to support their overheads.  I like that vibe :)
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office making sure the day to day adminstration and staff run smoothly and effectively.  I keep the internal systems ticking over and staff morale as high as I can.  I am involved in technology and human resources also.

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.occupational_info: I work with managers and leaders in organizations who want to be more strategic in their work, better at leading change initiatives, and stronger at developing people.

lenders.name: Mallory
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others find their inner entrepreneurial spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: As the most amazing group of people I've ever met.

lenders.name: Sipha
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that human motivation is 
an amazing engine. They have the motivation and I want to see their achievement. Then one day, they will also be able to loan to someone else :-)

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: I want to support those who lack the privileges I've had in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help neurologists run clinical research trials. I want to become a research neuroscientist someday.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help young adults develop the skills they need to find meaningful employment.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people who want to help themselves. I get excited knowing I can make a difference in another persons life and that will have a ripple effect.
lenders.occupational_info: I have retired because of health reasons but I keep myself busy fundraising and volunteering.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: From two trips to Cambodia I have seen the need first hand, and I understand how much as little as a $250 loan means to someone there, and I want to help with a hand up rather than a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people use and resolve problems with SAP R/3 ECC6 payroll and financial accounting.

lenders.name: D, M, O & J
lenders.loan_because: Many people have helped us succeed.  We hope to pay it forward.

lenders.name: sam
lenders.loan_because: I can! If everyone who could loan to Kiva did we would improve so many lives. I love to know I'm helping someone improve thier life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm 15. I like to say I'm a photographer but I really just watch peoples dogs.

lenders.name: Shantih
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others as I have been helped by so many.

lenders.name: Tony and Norma

lenders.occupational_info:
What I do is help other people look and feel better about themselves by helping deep clean and soften their skin. This will help make your skin care products work 70% better than before. Our scientists have actually found the enzyne that causes the cells to age and is the only company to manufacture a product, coming soon, to stop you from aging. 
  
Over 100 million meals have been donated by our caring associates and company matches to not just feed, but nourish children all over the world.  Be a part of this now by going to my Website click on the link below.

I also help others start there own worldwide anti-aging business, which the difference can be demonstrated and guaranteed or your money back. We are in 48 or more country, so we need your help TODAY!

lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to make positive change in their life.

lenders.name: Kim Rose
lenders.loan_because:
I come from a country of ridiculous abundance, even during an economic crisis.  A few years ago over the holidays, I discovered KIVA. Rather than once again succumbing to the frenzy of mindless holiday shopping, I instead chose to give my loved ones the "gift" of the KIVA experience: what it "feels" like when you contribute to someone else's life and dreams.  

Pay it forward, as we are a global community now, and make a difference once person at a time.  

Thanks KIVA folks, for the great idea, and the great feeling!
